mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yanxue_yuyue_uuid_number as yanxueYuyueUuidNumber ,a.yanxue_id as yanxueId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.yanxue_yuyue_text as yanxueYuyueText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.yanxue_yuyue_yesno_types as yanxueYuyueYesnoTypes ,a.yanxue_yuyue_yesno_text as yanxueYuyueYesnoText ,a.yanxue_yuyue_shenhe_time as yanxueYuyueShenheTime ,a.create_time as createTime
